section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: The CEM3340 IC is seeing somewhat of a renaissance due to its reissue by a few semiconductor companies (ref to go here).

sentences: Notably, one such company appears to have garnered the blessing of Mary Curtis (Doug's widow) herself, touted in these words appearing on a graphic on their sourcing page:
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: "A message from Mary Curtis":
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: Many of you who are active on synth forums have recently contacted us regarding another company's claim of producing VCO chips that are the equivalent to the CEM3340 that was used in many legendary synthesizers.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: To avoid any confusion, please know that there is only one manufacturer of the authentic CEM3340 designed by my late husband, Doug Curtis.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: Any claims, use of this product designation, and use of the name Curtis Electromusic by other companies are made without permission from OnChip Systems (our current company name) or the Curtis Family.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: As much as Doug would be humbled and so very happy about the legacy his products enjoy, we can assure you that as a person of the highest integrity he would be deeply saddened by the attempt of others to trade on his name and to make unsubstantiated claims of equivalency to his original inventions.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: In his loving memory and gratitude for the community of musicians and synthesizer enthusiasts, Doug's family is committed to making his authentic designs available as demand presents itself.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: Thank you for your continued support of Doug's analog synthesizer legacy.
section: == Curtis Chips in Post-Modern Synth Arena ==

sentences: - Mary Curtis and our daughters, Ashley and Julia
